headline: Mini Air Fryer Cherry Hand Pies
description: These delicious little hand pies filled with a cherry pie filling are great for snacking or for parties. They are quick and easy to make using prepared pie dough and pie filling.
name: Mini Air Fryer Cherry Hand Pies
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon coarse sugar crystals for sprinkling

recipeInstructions.text: Roll out each circle of pie dough to 1/8-inch thickness. Cut circles into the dough using a 3-inch round cookie cutter to make 16 circles (8 from each dough round).

Moisten the edge of a circle with water, then add 1 tablespoon cherry pie filling in the center. Fold the circle in half and pinch the edges of the dough together to seal. Use a fork to crimp the edges to secure them further. Add a slit in the top of the crust with a sharp knife. Repeat with the remaining dough circles.

Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and spray the air fryer bucket with cooking spray. Place pies in the basket in a single layer (you may need to work in batches). Spray the tops of the pies with more cooking spray, and sprinkle the tops with coarse sugar.
Cook in the air fryer until golden brown, about 9 minutes.

review.reviewBody: I really like this recipe it's easy and the taste is great. I added 1 tsp. of Vanilla along with the Almond flavoring.

The recipe is very easy to make. I made my own pastry because I don't care for all the chemicals in the store bought type. I found out quickly that you cannot put but a small amount of cherry filling into each pie because it does spread out when you fold it over, so I decided to just put one of the cut outs on top of the other one and make it a round little pie. It worked out great and I was able to get extra filling in it. It needs a little glaze to go over the top to make it a little sweeter, but they turned out great. This would be a wonderful little snack for a tea or for kids who have a sleep over. I just wish I could have cooked more than 3 at a time. Good recipe!

item.name: Mini Air Fryer Cherry Hand Pies
